p: A randomized, phase 3 clinical trial of 5 versus 10 days of remdesivir, sponsored by Gilead Sciences, is enrolling patients with severe COVID-19 (ClinicalTrials.gov identifier: NCT04292899). Primary outcomes are the odds of ratio for improvement on a seven-point ordinal scale on day 14. 37 Another phase 3, randomized trial of remdesivir (ClinicalTrials.gov identifier: NCT04292730) is the same as NCT04292899 except patients enrolling in that study undergo moderate COVID-19. The primary outcome is the proportion of subjects discharged by day 11. 38
